title: Crispy Shaved Tofu with Couscous & Cashew Cream
description: A vegan dinner featuring thin slices of crispy tofu served over cashew cream with toasted couscous and a side salad.
instructions: Take a block of super firm tofu and use a vegetable peeler to shave off thin slices.
Place the tofu slices in a bowl with soy sauce, lemon juice, grated garlic, maple syrup, smoked paprika, black pepper, and olive oil. Mix together.
Spread the tofu out on a baking tray lined with parchment so that all pieces are exposed on top.
Roast in a 425°F oven for 30 to 40 minutes, broiling at the end for the last 2 minutes.
For the cashew cream, add soaked cashews, water, nutritional yeast, salt, and lemon juice to a blender and blend until creamy.
Prepare toasted couscous according to package instructions.
Serve the crispy tofu over the cashew cream with toasted couscous and a side salad if desired.
